H0.text: Ailurophobia is the abnormal fear of what. Dogs

H1.text: Ailurophobia is the abnormal fear of what. Bats

H2.text: Ailurophobia is the abnormal fear of what. Rats

H3.text: Ailurophobia is the abnormal fear of what. CATS

A4.text: Ailurophobia is the persistent and excessive fear of cats and felines in general.

A5.text: In one case, it was reported that a patient with ailurophobia was unable to touch clothing that had a soft, fur-like texture, possibly due to the clothing's similarity to a cat's fur.
